page.title: 04CHIPPING WARDEN YOUTH CLUB
page.content: The youth club started in November 1983 and is held every Monday night in the school canteen. At the youth club they play games like snooker and table tennis and darts. They have to be 11 before they can join. Sometimes they go on trips like badminton and swimming and it is good fun. They have sweets and Panda pops as well. There are about 30 members and they pay 20p. a week. If the weather is nice they sometimes play rounders. Not long ago they bought a record player. A man came from Northampton and played indoor hockey. Everyone enjoyed it. The people who run the youth club are Mr and Mrs Grigson, Mrs Buckingham, Mrs Turner and Mr Rogers. by Lucy Buckingham aged 7
